Engage with scientific communities both in India and worldwide.
Explore research partnerships and recruit top international talent.
Be part of a major international conference covering education, research, and innovation.

advertisement.title: Advertisement in Conference Proceedings
description: IC-SIT 2026 offers an exclusive opportunity for corporate entities, industries, and technical institutes to showcase their companies, services, and products to a wide-ranging audience. On the eve of the conference, a Conference Proceedings will be published, encompassing abstracts of all accepted research articles, noteworthy keynotes from eminent speakers, and vital technical information. This significant publication will be made available in both digital and hard copy formats, ensuring an extensive reach.

To maximize visibility and effectively reach your target audience, we invite you to advertise in the conference souvenir. By securing ad space in the Conference Proceedings, you can capitalize on this valuable platform to promote your brand, highlight your services, and exhibit your products.
